data.title: Careerist
data.desc: Complete 5 jobs in a row - in-time, without taking any damage to cargo and without using autoparking

data.title: Test Drive Limited
data.desc: Drive 999 km during jobs with each of at least 5 truck brands, only your owned trucks count

data.title: Failure Is Not an Option
data.desc: Complete any 5 scenarios in a row without failure from the third or fourth chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

data.title: Get the Ball Rollin'
data.desc: Complete the first scenario of the first chapter in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

data.title: Professional Driver
data.desc: Complete at least 6 scenarios in the fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics while using only the interior camera (Driving Academy)

data.title: Rowing Through the Gears
data.desc: Complete 20 scenarios in chapters two, three or four using manual transmission in Truck Driving Basics (Driving Academy)

data.title: One-Shottin' It
data.desc: Complete any scenario in fourth chapter of Truck Driving Basics in one attempt without correcting by driving forward (Driving Academy)

data.title: Advanced Student
data.desc: Complete the pass conditions in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

data.title: Nerd of the Road
data.desc: Obtain 3 stars in at least 23 scenarios in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

data.title: Shining Star
data.desc: Obtain 3 stars in any 3 scenarios played in a row in Truck Driving Proficiency (Driving Academy)

data.title: Dedicated Student
data.desc: Complete at least 28 scenarios in Truck Driving Basics including the final exams (Driving Academy)

data.title: Concrete Jungle
data.desc: Complete 10 deliveries from concrete plants (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

data.title: Like a Farmer
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 4 farms in Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

data.title: Industry Standard
data.desc: Make 2 deliveries to locomotive, furniture and paper mill factories (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

data.title: Grand Tour
data.desc: Complete excellent deliveries between the following countries: Russia - Lithuania; Lithuania - Latvia; Latvia - Estonia; Estonia - Russia; Russia - Finland. Any order or direction counts (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

data.title: Exclave Transit
data.desc: Complete 5 deliveries from Kaliningrad to any other Russian city (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

data.title: Baltic Tourist
data.desc: Discover at least 20 Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC cities (requires Beyond the Baltic Sea DLC)

data.title: Along the Black Sea
data.desc: Complete excellent deliveries between these coastal cities: Istanbul-Burgas, Burgas-Varna, Varna-Mangalia, MangaliaConstanța. Any order or direction counts (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

data.title: Ferryman
data.desc: Use a river ferry (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

data.title: Ranger
data.desc: Visit at least 4 border crossings between Romania, Bulgaria and Turkey (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

data.title: Orient Express
data.desc: Complete deliveries between following cities, in this order and direction: Paris-Strasbourg, Strasbourg-Munich, Munich-Vienna, Vienna-Budapest, Budapest-Bucharest, Bucharest-Istanbul (requires Road to the Black Sea and Going East DLCs)

data.title: Turkish Delight
data.desc: Complete 3 deliveries from Istanbul which are at least 2,500 km long (requires Road to the Black Sea and Going East DLCs)

data.title: Taking the Scenic Route
data.desc: Visit the following landmarks and locations: Iron Gates, Bran Castle (Romania), Pomorie Beach, Wall of Heroes in Varna (Bulgaria), Lake Küçükçekmece in Istanbul (Turkey) (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

data.title: Balkan Explorer
data.desc: Discover at least 20 Road to the Black Sea DLC cities (requires Road to the Black Sea DLC)

data.title: From the Comfort of Your Home
data.desc: Buy a truck online

data.title: Holiday Coastline
data.desc: Complete 3 deliveries along the coast in this order: Rijeka - Zadar - Split - Niksic (requires West Balkans DLC)

data.title: Grand Adventurer
data.desc: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in West Balkans (requires West Balkans DLC)

data.title: Going Camping
data.desc: Deliver the following cargoes from companies in West Balkans to complete a production chain in this order: Ore, Aluminium Ingots, Electrical Wiring, Electronics, Campervans (requires West Balkans DLC)

data.title: Through the Serpentines
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) between Pristina and Bijelo Polje (requires West Balkans DLC)

data.title: Road to the Adriatics
data.desc: Discover at least 20 cities in West Balkans (requires West Balkans DLC)

data.title: Swimming in Success
data.desc: Reach an average daily profit of €450,000

data.title: Head Hunter
data.desc: Discover at least 40 recruitment agencies

data.title: Check-in, Check-out
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 3 cargo airport terminals in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

data.title: Landmark Tour
data.desc: Discover following landmarks of France: Carcassonne, Brotonne bridge, Tiger tank, Peyrat-le-Château, Château de Ventadour, Château d'Ussé (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

data.title: Go Nuclear!
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 3 nuclear plants in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

data.title: Gas Must Flow!
data.desc: Deliver diesel, LPG or petrol to at least 3 truck stops in France (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

data.title: Bon Voyage!
data.desc: Discover at least 20 French cities (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

data.title: All Around the Isle of Beauty
data.desc: Discover at least 4 Corsican cities (requires Vive la France ! DLC)

data.title: Property Magnate
data.desc: Own at least 30 garages

data.title: National Company
data.desc: Own at least one largest garage in your headquarter country

data.title: Sights and Legends
data.desc: View cutscenes from at least 8 viewpoints in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

data.title: All Inclusive
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 4 unique hotels in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

data.title: Temple Worthy
data.desc: Deliver 3 Marble Blocks and 3 undamaged Marble Slabs from Rock Eater Quarry in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

data.title: Gift of Athena
data.desc: Deliver olives or olive oil from Eliarchos Olive Farm to 5 different cities in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

data.title: Odyssean Voyager
data.desc: Discover at least 12 cities in Greece (requires Greece DLC)

data.title: You Bet I Can Park It!
data.desc: Collect 1,000 XP from parking on Heavy Cargo Pack deliveries (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: No Pain No Gain
data.desc: Deliver total of 250 tons of cargo on 5 consecutive jobs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: I Thought This Should Be Heavy?!
data.desc: Complete a delivery of at least 8 unique cargoes from the Heavy Cargo Pack (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: Time for Big Hauling
data.desc: Deliver first Heavy Cargo (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: Keep Calm and Haul Heavy
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) of 3 consecutive Heavy Cargo Pack jobs (requires Heavy Cargo Pack DLC)

data.title: Iberian Pilgrimage
data.desc: Complete a delivery from Lisbon, Seville, and Pamplona to A Coruña (requires Iberia DLC)

data.title: Let's Get Shipping
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 4 container ports in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

data.title: Grand Tour Guide
data.desc: View cutscenes from at least 12 viewpoints in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

data.title: Fleet Builder
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 3 shipyards in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

data.title: Taste the Sun
data.desc: Deliver ADR cargo to at least 2 solar power plants in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

data.title: Conquistador
data.desc: Discover at least 30 cities in Iberia (requires Iberia DLC)

data.title: True Sicilian
data.desc: Own a garage in at least 2 Sicilian cities (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: Michelangelo
data.desc: Complete a delivery from Carrara quarry (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: Many Roads Lead to Rome
data.desc: Enter Rome from at least 3 corridors that lead to it (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: Captain
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 1 Italian shipyard (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: Imperator
data.desc: Discover at least 15 Italian cities (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: All Around the Blue Island
data.desc: Discover at least 2 Sardinian cities (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: Mind the Lava
data.desc: Visit Etna and Vesuvius volcanoes (requires Italia DLC)

data.title: Reliable Contractor
data.desc: Perform jobs for at least 15 different companies in the game

data.title: Long Hauler
data.desc: Complete a delivery that was greater than 2,000 km

data.title: Experience Beats All!
data.desc: Complete deliveries with following trailer types: Machinery, ADR cargo, Container, Refrigerated, Liquid cargo, Fragile cargo, Construction, Bulk cargo

data.title: Profit Hunter
data.desc: Complete a job worth over €130,000 and minimum 2,200 km

data.title: Just in Time!
data.desc: Take an urgent delivery for a minimum of 550 km and complete it with less than 30 minutes remaining

data.title: Minimaxer
data.desc: Gain 20,000 XP for several consecutive jobs with the total distance below 10,000 km

data.title: All Is Possible
data.desc: Take and complete jobs with at least 30 different cargo

data.title: Working with the Elite
data.desc: Achieve 100% of productivity for at least 5 large garages at the same time

data.title: Pathfinder
data.desc: Discover at least 40,000 kilometers of roads

data.title: I Am a GPS
data.desc: Discover at least 20,000 kilometers of roads

data.title: Aspects of Professionalism
data.desc: Have at least 10 female and 10 male employees of maximum level in your company

data.title: My Precious
data.desc: Design and apply to your truck a custom multi-color metallic paint

data.title: Job Is Only Worth It If It's Done Well!
data.desc: Complete a perfect delivery (no damage, no fines, in-time) for a job that is at least 1,000 km

data.title: Performance Optimizer
data.desc: Achieve at least 75% of the average garage productivity for 10 large garages in your company

data.title: Honey, I'm Home
data.desc: Use quick travel to return to your headquarters

data.title: Whatever Floats Your Boat
data.desc: Deliver cargo to at least 1 container port in Scandinavia DLC (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: Cattle Drive
data.desc: Complete a cattle delivery to any company in Scandinavia DLC (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: Sailor
data.desc: Deliver yachts to all Scandinavian marinas (requires Scandinavia and High Power Cargo Pack DLCs)

data.title: Aquaphobia
data.desc: Travel across the Øresund Bridge between Copenhagen and Malmö (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: Miner
data.desc: Complete delivery jobs to at least 3 quarries in Scandinavia DLC (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: Scania Trucks Lover
data.desc: Deliver truck cargo from Scania factory (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: Sightseer
data.desc: Discover at least 15 Scandinavia DLC cities (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: Volvo Trucks Lover
data.desc: Deliver truck cargo from Volvo Trucks factory (requires Scandinavia DLC)

data.title: The Bigger the Better
data.desc: Complete at least 10 unique deliveries of oversize cargoes (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Driver Exceptionnel
data.desc: Complete deliveries on at least 10 oversize routes in base game (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Big Brother
data.desc: Complete delivery of the Haul Truck Chassis (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Size Matters
data.desc: Deliver first oversize cargo (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Mass-to-don
data.desc: Deliver at least 195 tons of oversized cargo in just 3 consecutive deliveries (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Not a Big Problem
data.desc: Complete 3 consecutive oversize jobs without any damage (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Not a Canoe
data.desc: Complete delivery of the Service Boat (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Giant
data.desc: Complete delivery of the Silo cargo (requires Special Transport DLC)

data.title: Parking Challenge
data.desc: Complete 20 deliveries choosing the trailer delivery option which requires reversing

data.title: Successfully Docked
data.desc: Use at least 5 ports in the game (counts sea, river and train ports)

data.title: Friends Are Always Here to Help You
data.desc: Use automatic parking

data.title: Sardine
data.desc: Utilize a boat

data.title: Diesel, No Petrol!
data.desc: Use a filling station

data.title: Zzzzz
data.desc: Use a rest stop

data.title: Choo-Choo
data.desc: Use the train to cross the channel
